title: 12/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Chris Simms about how dangerous the Rams can be come playoffs time. ESPN's Jeff Van Gundy joins the show and tells us whether he'd want Kyrie Irving. And Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo tells us where Cooper Kupp ranks amongst receivers in the game right now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
